amendment.description: Amendment exempts all National Forests in Alaska from the U.S. Forest Service Roadless Rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to exempt all National Forests in Alaska from the U.S. Forest Service Roadless Rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 207 (Roll no. 199).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 207 (Roll no. 199).
